fields.summary: appcd: Stop any running daemon instances post npm install

comments.body: [~cbarber] As the CLI doesnt run npm install (so no postinstall events), do we need to figure out another solution for the daemon distributed under the CLI when a user does an {{appc use 7.0.1}} when already having a 7.0.0 CLI with the daemon started on their machine?
